title.narrative: E2P Setting get 2 scale

description.narrative: Empowered to Protect (E2P) is a community based SGBV prevention program addressing several root causes of SGBV: gender inequality, harmful norms and power abuse. E2P works through group sessions, during which people are encouraged to question their own role and context in relation to SGBV. This promotes reflection on harmful norms and conflict-prone behavior and promotes the internalization of alternative norms and behavior. It also promotes reflection on institutions and services needed to tackle the issue and how to relate to them.
